alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 3:12PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Otero, east central Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 312 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Higbee, or 26 miles south of North La Junta, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Otero, east central Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
